ideaItems.title: Add session_id or caller_pid to governed telemetry event schema to enable actor attribution in future zombie incidents.
ideaItems.body: TASK-01 could not confirm actor identity with 80% confidence; no session metadata in events.jsonl.

ideaItems.title: Octorate → Google Hotel Free Listing activation: Not a new idea — VC-02 plan-level gate explicitly requires this. Trigger action: run /lp-do-plan brikette-google-hotel-free-listing within 5 business days of TASK-01 sign-off.
ideaItems.body: fact-find confirmed Octorate Metasearch active (2026-02-18), GBP verified, both blockers resolved

ideaItems.title: /assistance Book Direct CTA copy i18n audit
ideaItems.body: The "Book Direct" button text in AssistanceIndexContent uses a hardcoded string; other locales are untested.
ideaItems.suggested_action: create card (P2 i18n, can batch with next locale pass)

ideaItems.title: /how-to-get-here server-resolved hero H1 (sub-track C)
ideaItems.body: TASK-11 deferred useHowToGetHereContent audit — HowToGetHereIndexContent hook needs investigation before server-resolved props pattern can be applied safely.

ideaItems.title: RSC conversion for RoomsStructuredData + ExperiencesStructuredData
ideaItems.body: TASK-10 investigation confirmed both use useCurrentLanguage() (client hooks) but all underlying data is static — full RSC conversion is feasible and would eliminate the client component boundary.
ideaItems.suggested_action: create card (P3 SSR, low urgency post-launch)

ideaItems.title: Consider adding a CI lint step that fails when a build-record.user.md is committed without an ## Outcome Contract section, so the contract-first constraint is enforced at commit time rather than post-hoc by the Build Summary generator.
ideaItems.body: TASK-04 established the contract as a required section in the template but enforcement is instructional only (no automated gate).
ideaItems.suggested_action: defer — low urgency until v2 adoption rate is measurable; revisit after 2026-03-27 cutover.

ideaItems.title: The Build-Event-Ref frontmatter link from strategy artifacts to build-event.json requires a manual step from lp-do-build. An automated hook in the lp-do-build SKILL.md completion checklist was documented but not code-enforced. If operators skip the step the canonical event is never read by the Build Summary generator.
ideaItems.body: TASK-05 notes lp-do-build SKILL.md must be updated to include build-event emission step (documentation impact recorded).
ideaItems.suggested_action: create a follow-up card to audit lp-do-build/SKILL.md and add the emission step to the build completion checklist.

ideaItems.title: 1 of 4 generated seeds was not accepted in pilot review.
ideaItems.body: 1 of 4 generated seeds was not accepted in pilot review.

ideaItems.title: Add a small seed-ranking layer for mapper outputs (high/medium/low impact) before handoff to planning.
ideaItems.body: add a small seed-ranking layer for mapper outputs (high/medium/low impact) before handoff to planning.

ideaItems.title: Add a strict profile resolver in compiler/materializer shared utility to avoid duplicate logistics-conditional logic drift.
ideaItems.body: add a strict profile resolver in compiler/materializer shared utility to avoid duplicate logistics-conditional logic drift.

ideaItems.title: Create a focused INVESTIGATE task to calibrate ranking heuristics with two additional historical deltas.
ideaItems.body: create a focused INVESTIGATE task to calibrate ranking heuristics with two additional historical deltas.
ideaItems.suggested_action: create a focused INVESTIGATE task to calibrate ranking heuristics with two additional historical deltas.

ideaItems.title: Create an IMPLEMENT task to centralize business-profile evaluation and reuse it across compiler, materializer, and mapper.
ideaItems.body: create an IMPLEMENT task to centralize business-profile evaluation and reuse it across compiler, materializer, and mapper.
ideaItems.suggested_action: create an IMPLEMENT task to centralize business-profile evaluation and reuse it across compiler, materializer, and mapper.

ideaItems.title: Logistics applicability is currently inferred in multiple places.
ideaItems.body: logistics applicability is currently inferred in multiple places.

ideaItems.title: Add a lightweight CI reminder/gate to require a populated physical-device matrix (or explicit waiver) before plan closure for animation-heavy UI changes.
ideaItems.body: Add a lightweight CI reminder/gate to require a populated physical-device matrix (or explicit waiver) before plan closure for animation-heavy UI changes.

ideaItems.title: Add a small runtime diagnostics toggle for BrandMark phase/frame sampling that can be enabled in staging for faster performance triage.
ideaItems.body: Add a small runtime diagnostics toggle for BrandMark phase/frame sampling that can be enabled in staging for faster performance triage.

ideaItems.title: Add a dedicated scripts package command (for example check-website-contract-parity) and wire it into the standard startup-loop validation path so WEBSITE parity checks run by default.
ideaItems.body: Add a dedicated scripts package command (for example check-website-contract-parity) and wire it into the standard startup-loop validation path so WEBSITE parity checks run by default.

ideaItems.title: Add a lightweight doc-lint rule that flags legacy stage aliases in authoritative startup-loop workflow sections unless explicitly tagged historical.
ideaItems.body: Add a lightweight doc-lint rule that flags legacy stage aliases in authoritative startup-loop workflow sections unless explicitly tagged historical.

ideaItems.title: Add a repeatable artifact schema for memory/elapsed metrics per run (same variant set), then wire it into ongoing mitigation cycles for clearer trend detection.
ideaItems.body: add a repeatable artifact schema for memory/elapsed metrics per run (same variant set), then wire it into ongoing mitigation cycles for clearer trend detection.
ideaItems.suggested_action: add a repeatable artifact schema for memory/elapsed metrics per run (same variant set), then wire it into ongoing mitigation cycles for clearer trend detection.

ideaItems.body: create a focused plan to validate the same probe matrix on a higher-memory build class and compare pass/fail + memory envelope before additional config churn.
ideaItems.suggested_action: create a focused plan to validate the same probe matrix on a higher-memory build class and compare pass/fail + memory envelope before additional config churn.
